findings.title: ST - Stops Transactions
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to stop transactions for all users excluding the owner.

findings.title: RSV - Redundant State Variables
findings.description: Redundant state variables that can be optimized for better performance and efficiency.

findings.title: DDP - Decimal Division Precision
findings.description: Decimal division precision issue that may lead to rounding errors.

findings.title: RSML - Redundant SafeMath Library
findings.description: The contract uses a redundant SafeMath library for arithmetic operations.

findings.title: IDI - Immutable Declaration Improvement
findings.description: Variables can be declared as immutable to improve performance and efficiency.

findings.title: L04 - Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
findings.description: The contract does not follow the Solidity naming conventions.

findings.title: L05 - Unused State Variable
findings.description: An unused state variable is declared in the contract.

findings.title: L07 - Missing Events Arithmetic
findings.description: The contract may be missing required events for arithmetic operations.

findings.title: L09 - Dead Code Elimination
findings.description: There is dead code in the contract that can be removed to improve efficiency.

findings.title: L13 - Divide before Multiply Operation
findings.description: The order of operations may lead to a loss of precision in arithmetic calculations.

findings.title: L15 - Local Scope Variable Shadowing
findings.description: Local variables with the same name as outer scope variables can cause confusion.

findings.title: L16 - Validate Variable Setters
findings.description: The contract does not properly check for zero values in variable setters.
